verses.plain: If it had not been the LORD who was on our side, now may Israel say;

tokens.t: who was on our side, now may Israel say;

verses.plain: If it had not been the LORD who was on our side, when men rose up against us:

tokens.t: who was on our side, when men rose up against us:

verses.plain: Then they had swallowed us up quick, when their wrath was kindled against us:

tokens.t: Then they had swallowed us up quick, when their wrath was kindled against us:

verses.plain: Then the waters had overwhelmed us, the stream had gone over our soul:

tokens.t: Then the waters had overwhelmed us, the stream had gone over our soul:

verses.plain: Then the proud waters had gone over our soul.

tokens.t: Then the proud waters had gone over our soul.

verses.plain: Blessed be the LORD, who hath not given us as a prey to their teeth.
Our soul is escaped as a bird out of the snare of the fowlers: the snare is broken, and we are escaped.

tokens.t: Our soul is escaped as a bird out of the snare of the fowlers: the snare is broken, and we are escaped.

verses.plain: Our help is in the name of the LORD, who made heaven and earth.
